wording.title: WeEuropeans
wording.question: What are the concrete steps we can take to reinvent Europe?

metas.title: What are the concrete steps we can take to reinvent Europe?
metas.description: Do you have any ideas on this? Participate in the biggest public consultation by Make.org

introCard.title: Thousands of citizens are proposing solutions to reinvent Europe.
description: Give your opinion of these solutions or propose your own.
The ideas that receive the most support are those that should be promoted by candidates in the European elections.

signUpCard.title: Receive the results of the consultation and be informed about upcoming actions
signUpCard.nextCTA: No thanks, I donâ€™t wish to be informed of the results.

finalCard.title: Thank you for your participation
share: Would you like to go further in reinventing Europe?
finalCard.learn_more_title: Find out all about the WeEuropeans project
